item.title: 阿里云ECS搭建Docker
item.description: 云服务器Elastic Compute Service（ECS）是阿里云提供的一种基础云计算服务。在其上搭建Docker步骤和注意事项

item.title: Docker部署nginx
item.description: Nginx (engine x) 是一个高性能的HTTP和反向代理服务，也是一个IMAP/POP3/SMTP服务。利用Docker安装nginx步骤和注意事项

item.title: 搭建ssr+polipo
item.description: https://github.com/storezhang/docker-ssr-client docker run -d -name ssrp -p 1081:1081 -v /etc/ssrp/data:/ssr-data 1 docker run -d --name ssrp -p 1081:1081 -v /etc/ssrp/data:/ssr-data storezhang/ssr-client 1 docker exec -i bb2 /bin/sh 1 2 3 docker pull breakwa11/shadowsocksr docker run -itd -p 8888:8888 --env SERVER_PORT=8888 --env PASSWORD=$PASSWORD --name ssr breakwa11/shadowsocksr

item.title: 搭建gitlab
item.description: docker安装gitlab镜像 1. 镜像拉取 1 docker pull gitlab/gitlab-ce:latest https://www.centos.bz/2017/07/docker-install-gitlab-external-nginx/ https://www.cnblogs.com/liyangLife/p/8176791.html https://blog.csdn.net/u011054333/article/details/61532271 https://www.cnblogs.com/gdlinux/p/6760919.html
